description:
GPS Tracker provides all basic GPS functions and complete waypoint management.  Get all common GPS parameters and navigate with a GPS controlled compass.   There 
are 2 ways to save waypoints.  Enter a coordinate pair in any form, give it a name and it is fed into the database.  Alternatively, your current position can be saved as a waypoint. 
The waypoint database is presented as a list of waypoints.  Just tap a waypoint on the list and the waypoint finding compass will point you to that waypoint while reporting distance to the waypoint, heading and estimated time of arrival.  No internet or phone service required. Simple, effective, beautiful!
versionNote: You can now enter actual coordinates and save them to the waypoint database with a handy label.  You can still save your current position as a waypoint.
